text: Words speak through Osiris, Iri-pat, Hati-a, head of Upper Egypt Padihorresnet, the righteous.

text: The elder of the dockyard, #lc: 4# Hakti.
Archer in front of the Vizier!
Then the leader of the launderers of Pharaoh - LHG - went to the shore, while his heart was extremely disgusting because of the daily quarrels with him.
